course.title: R Programming A-Z™: R For Data Science With Real Exercises!
course.subtitle: Learn Programming In R And R Studio. Data Analytics, Data Science, Statistical Analysis, Packages, Functions, GGPlot2

reviews.body:
El curso es lo que promete ser, la introduccion BASICA al mundo de R, explicado de manera amena, estructurada y ordenada, en secuencia lógica.

usa datos reales para los ejercicios y al final de cada sección refuerzan los conceptos básicos que deben quedar mapeados. R es un hueso duro de roer así que luego de este debes estar preparado para más y más.

I thought the course was useful. This course was the right speed and the instructor did a good job explaining the R programming concepts. It was a basic course and a good starter course. The graphing section was very interesting and I can see where I could use that in a small company that needs the details, but doesn't want to fork out cash for out of the box reporting capabilities.

I have taken other online R courses in the past and the pace was a bit to fast or the ideas were abstract.

It's a great game, but the gameplay is too short, probably 2 in a bundle are more balanced to the price.

This guy knows teaching and learning.
Awesome Expwerience great learnig from basic to intermidiate.. definately advice to friends... thanks for such a wonderful knwoledge sharing Huge respect Sir Thanks a lot
Well presented. Clear and concise. Only thing I would have liked to see was a range of exercises to go through after the course, to just keep practising everything learnt.
This course is excellent as it helps to learn R step by step. Thank you to Kirill Eremenko for putting this course together and explaining every part clearly!

This course was amazing! Kirill explained really complex concepts in a very concise manner that was easy to understand. I really appreciated how he provided many real-life examples and exercises as well. So glad I took this course!

So far, it has been very basic but as someone really struggling at been thrown in at the deep end I found the explanations really helpful and clear. As the course went on, I got more confident with R and became better skilled for my research needs.

Great course content! Helps understand the important features of R Programming. Really helpful for beginners who wish to understand the use of R programming in the data science field. I made use of this course to visualize and compare RNA-seq data. Overall, great course !!
I was looking for a good intro to R with examples and exercises. The teacher is really good at explaining also some stats concepts and how to interpret for example data vis .

I finished the course and I have to say it was beyond awesome... one of the very few courses that I have actually finished! Kirill is an awesome instructor and very engaging and makes studying fun. would recommend this course for anyone starting out R
Amazing course, got to learn so much and it was all very easy to follow. Would recommend to anyone keen on getting a feel of R and all the visualisation it can provide.

instructor.name: Kirill Eremenko
instructor.briefIntroduction:
My name is Kirill Eremenko and I am super-psyched that you are reading this!

Professionally, I am a Data Science management consultant with over five years of experience in finance, retail, transport and other industries. I was trained by the best analytics mentors at Deloitte Australia and today I leverage Big Data to drive business strategy, revamp customer experience and revolutionize existing operational processes.

From my courses you will straight away notice how I combine my real-life experience and academic background in Physics and Mathematics to deliver professional step-by-step coaching in the space of Data Science. I am also passionate about public speaking, and regularly present on Big Data at leading Australian universities and industry events.

To sum up, I am absolutely and utterly passionate about Data Science and I am looking forward to sharing my passion and knowledge with you!
